basics.name: Oluwatoyin Ayanleye
basics.label: Security Engineer
basics.summary: With a background in embedded systems and deep learning, I have a strong foundation in technology and practical experience in cybersecurity. My skills include web application security, cloud security, automation, AWS, Burp Suite Professional, and Python. I am committed to building a career in application security and continuously learning and improving my skills through practical experience, including participation in bug bounties, vulnerability disclosure programs, code reviews, and CTFs. Check out my resume

education.institution: University of Ibadan, Ibadan, Oyo, Nigeria

highlights: Managed AWS applications and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub workflows and CodePipeline
Handled development/maintenance of python libraries for our applications as well as external API integrations and data analysis
Performed frequent log analysis to determine the state of the system as well as potential areas of improvement
Handled development of cloud services and optimized for compute, memory, cost and security
Hacker on HackerOne with username nulcell
Found account takeover by exploiting login page feature to harvest credentials and API keys
Found leaked API keys in live and archived pages for a VDP, which lead to control of all customer accounts
Aided recon and exploitation of various bugs with friends
Consulted on penetration tests for clients
Assisted in PCI DSS v4 compliance for clients
Performed vulnerability assessments and proposed remediations
Discovered and exploited various critical vulnerabilities in an insurance company
Chained vulnerabilities to get RCE and took control over other websites running on the server
Gained access to the database contents via SQLi
Discovered SSRF which exposed internal systems of a national body
I served as technical support for hosted events

volunteer.organization: Google Developer Student Club - University of Ibadan
volunteer.summary: Training students who want to get into the field of Cybersecurity

awards.title: Cyber Talents Nationals CTF Nigeria - 1st Place
awards.summary: Cyber Talents' Annual CTF National for Nigeria to qualify for Africa and Middle-East Challenge

awards.title: American Business Council Cybersecurity CTF - 2nd Place
awards.summary: A CTF hosted by The American Business Council Nigeria for Cybersecurity Professionals
